From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Good evening MR Foxfingers, you and your team of specialists have been
selected for a rescue mission behind enemy lines. If caught or killed your
faction will disavow any knowlege of your existence. your mission- should
you choose to accept it- sneak around the Alliance base, find out what
happened to Silver Scout  and if possible rescue her.

This message will self destruct in ten seconds.
----- Original Message -----
From: CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 3:41 AM
Subject: Re: (unknown)


Grizzletron is in the CR chamber inside Veratis' ship, the mutants are
getting ready to leave so Veratis will be the only one to play with.


----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars AKA Proto <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 1:41 PM
Subject: (unknown)


OOC:  Im BACK...  Stop Booing... Im back, Im sorry that I didn't post the
days I didn't post.  Parents out of time and It was Party time.  So I might
be a little slow with my post.


BIC:

   �Grizzltron�


    Grizzltron was about to finish getting repaired in the Mutants CR
chamber (They put me in there right?)



   �Hugar�


    Hugar looked at Cyndro.  "Yes, Please take me to a waiting room."
